verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1.Nimeahidi Yesu kukutumikia
wewe u Bwana wangu u rafiki pia

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
sitaogopa vita wewe ndiwe mwenza
sitaiacha njia ukiniongoza

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Imbeni aleluya,aleluya imbeni
shangwe kwa Bwana Yesu ndiye mwenza wetu

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2.Dunia i karibu Bwana siniache
na mengi majaribu yapo pande zote

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
siku zote adui ni ndani na nje
Bwana Yesu nivute karibu na wewe

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
3.Nikusikie wewe nena nami Bwana
kelele za dunia ndizo mingi sana

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
nena kunihimiza au kunionya
nena nikusikie mwenye kuniponya

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
4.Umewapa ahadi wakufuatao
kwenda uliko wewe wawe huko nawe

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
nami nimeahidi kukutumikia
nipe neema bwana ya kukwandamia

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
5.Hatua zako BWana na nizikanyange
wewe u mwenye nguvu mimi nimmnyonge

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
niongoze nivute nishike daima
mwishoni niwasili mbinguni salama
